title: ‘Crisis on top of crisis’: Scotland faces threat from dangerous form of opioids, experts warn
summary: Synthetic opioids like nitazene are associated with over 100 fatalities and can be up to 100 times more potent than traditional opioids. This increased strength poses significant risks for users and complicates addiction treatment efforts. The emergence of such substances highlights the ongoing opioid crisis and the need for enhanced public health measures.

title: Portobello review – Marco Bellocchio’s glorious saga of TV stars, mafia prisoners and lace doilies
summary: The new six-part series highlights the rise of 80s primetime host Enzo Tortora, juxtaposed with the chaotic situation of a mob secretary who entangles him and his parrot in a drug trafficking scandal. The first two episodes creatively weave these narratives together. This intriguing plot sets the stage for exploring Tortora's fall from grace amidst the allegations.
